Translations.Text: Ili dir O Moses ni neniam enter gxi long as ili est gxi! Do ir! - Vi your Lord - Kaj batal! Ni sid dekstr here
Li dir My Lord mi nur control my frat. Tial allow us part kompani wicked popol
Li dir Henceforth gxi forbidden them 40 jar which ili roam ter aimlessly. Ne grieve such wicked popol
Recite them prav histori Adam's 2 fil. Ili far ofert gxi akcept 1 de them ne el ali. Li dir mi surely kill vi. Li dir DI akcept nur el des righteous
Vi etend your man kill me mi ne etend my man kill vi. Por mi reverence DI Lord univers
Mi want vi ne me urs my pek your pek tiam vi end dwellers Infer! Such est requital transgressors
His ego provoked him into killing his frat. Li killed him ended losers
DI TIAM SEND raven GRAT soil INSTRU him KIEL bury his FRAT KADAVR! Li dir Ve me mi failed est as inteligent as this raven bury my frat kadavr. Li igx rajd remorse
